properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:28PM CST until February 6 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
...Winter Storm to impact the region from tonight through
Wednesday...

.A light wintry mix of precipitation will spread from northwest
to southeast across the region late this afternoon and tonight as
a low pressure system approaches from the southwest. Snow will
then develop from southwest to northeast across the area on
Wednesday and may be heavy at times along and north of the
Interstate 44 corridor. A wintry mix will remain possible
Wednesday across south-central Missouri.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...Douglas, Howell, Shannon, Taney and Ozark Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
